Header: Troops Get More Job Opportunities for the Unemployed in Kilinochchi
Content: Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi (SFHQ-KLN), multiplying its projects to get more employment opportunities for the unemployed in Kilinochchi area, succeeded in getting 123 new employment openings in construction industry for young men and women in collaboration with the Jaffna-based ‘Harry Constructions Private Limited’. The conduct of interviews launched under the supervision of Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, General Officer Commanding, 57 Division with the able support of the 573 Brigade Commander got underway in Dharmapuram area after inviting those aspirants in Kandawali area. Interviews conducted by the employer selected those applicants under 22 categories and they were offered those openings in the adjacent Jaffna Province against a handsome salary. Earlier, the same 57 Division was able to get employment opportunities for Kilinochchi youths.
